title: Who do you main?
body:
Just a random question



Also I main Amumu Akali and Yi

replies.body: so can i contact u for my 1000 win ?

about the entire day ^^ but im on euw hope it doesnt provide a problem ^^'

which means we have 12hrs left from now

I'd block you if it actually meant we wouldn't be put in the same game. As a Warwick, Malzahar, and Kayle main, I cannot count the number of times an ally bard has gotten me killed by interrupting my ult and putting me in stasis while my target's allies catch up to me.

{{champion:32}} 
{{item:3070}}      like if you cry evrey tym
I can perform adequately with these.

You should focus on like two or three since adequately means you probably play them at the average skill level of your Elo. when you "main" just a couple champs that's when you start to play above your surrounding players' skill levels and climb substantially faster. (substantially faster doesn't sound right to me. is that proper grammar?)
Not too interested in climbing.  More interested in having fun and not being bored to hell, which is what I am when I play the same champion over and over and over for hundreds of games.

I play lots of champions so it never gets stale, but the thing is that I play Nami exclusively in Ranked, and in Normals I play everything else. My Rank is directly proportional to my skill with my main, and I never tire of her.

Okay! to each their own :) Also, I "mained" lots of champs before I found these 3 so they don't get boring to me. I think there's a champion like this for everyone they just gotta find it.

{{champion:9}}  > {{champion:75}}  > {{champion:25}}  > {{champion:120}}  > {{champion:421}}  > {{champion:91}}  > {{champion:412}}  > {{champion:104}}  > {{champion:111}}  > {{champion:107}}  :))

I already have a few champs I don't get tired of lol.
kalista and Kha'zix.  Just don't play Kha'zix anymore because he seems pretty weak to me now.

Graves isn't in the best spot right now either but it doesn't matter because I just crush my lane and get ahead. and then you should play more Kalista IMO but it doesn't really matter to me what you choose as long as you have fun

Shyv
Gragas
Ekko

B4 anyone says anything, I was playing Shyv and Grag back when people thought they were crap.  Grag back when he was an AP mid laner in season 2, and shyvana since b4 feral flare was a thing. I even went devourer shyv b4 the sated changes.

Jungle is my Main role
Mid is my Secondary Role
ADC is my Worst Role

{{champion:35}}  i feast upon your jungler's tears.  And he is just so much fun.  Mechanically he is very simple and straight-forward but 90% o his success is based on mind games and out-thinking your opponent.

Katarina, Ahri and Jinx!

I love Kat!
{{champion:114}}  It makes me feels so good.
How many times have you ulted to run away, in all honesty?
I currently am playing a lot of Lux and Janna. I've wish washed between a lot of champions, but I truly feel that those two resonate the most of what I want out of champs the most.
{{champion:54}} , {{champion:64}} , {{champion:59}} , and {{champion:5}} i love to main junglers and top laners

{{champion:421}} top. No one expects the sheer power she brings to top lane. I've destroyed many a {{champion:92}} through the power of calculated trades, burrowed Q poke, and outsustaining the hell out of her.

I've been going between {{champion:266}} , {{champion:37}} , {{champion:120}} , {{champion:114}} , {{champion:254}} , {{champion:412}} , {{champion:92}} , and {{champion:133}} since as long as I can remember.  I wish I could just pick one {{item:3151}}
singed bard gp teemo and panth mainly
Please don't..... Don't build Cleaver and Shiv on Ziggs..... lol
